problem.markdown:
>>Which two examples show a logical hierarchy?<<
[x] Year, Month, Date [ ] High, Medium, Low [x] Country, State, City [ ] Left, Center, Right
[explanation] The first and third options are correct. [explanation]
problem.p: Which two examples show a logical hierarchy?

checkboxgroup.label: Which two examples show a logical hierarchy?

div.p: The first and third options are correct.
